subject: Automating test data?
msgSnippet: I have a command class that takes a request object and produces a result object. I d like to have a config file that lays out the fields and values for the
messageBody:
I have a command class that takes a request object and produces a result object. I'd like to have a config file that lays out the fields and values for the request object, which method gets called to set the fields (or use introspection), and what values are expected in the result object (again using introspection to lookup fields).

Since there are lots of XML utility libraries out there (betwixt, digester, jelly, etc), I'm hoping there's a solution that already handles this kind of test data automation. Plaintext is also acceptible, I just don't want to write test data loading code if I don't have to.

Any recommendations?

thx
andy
